local_intent: Guarded lowering to make contact with the T-block and verify contact was achieved.
assumptions: End-effector is already laterally aligned near the block
Tabletop is within the allowed max_depth range
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the active leaf: maintain yaw=0, execute LowerUntilContact (slow, depth 0.02, force 10, 800 ms), then verify via ContactDetected. Includes a minimal perceive step (IsObjectVisible t_block) and alignment via SetTCPYaw as per the global plan.
